newsitem.title: MAURITIUS: Mauritius rupee firmer on dollar, weaker on pound.
newsitem.headline: Mauritius rupee firmer on dollar, weaker on pound.

text.p: The Mauritian rupee strengthened slightly against the dollar and weakened against the pound on Tuesday, foreign exchange dealers said. The rupee was fixed at a commercial bank mean rate of 20.0965 to the dollar from 20.1565 on Monday. The rupee was posted at a mean rate of 32.9860 to the pound from 32.9260, they added.
"International trends showed the weakening of the dollar due to profit taking by investors after the Easter holidays," a dealer said.
